text: Ian "H" Watkins (born 8 May 1976) is a Welsh singer, dancer and actor. He was born in Cwmparc. He is best known for being a member of the British pop group Steps. He has said that "H" stands for "hyperactive", describing his character. After Steps broke up in 2001, he formed a singing duo with Claire Richards, who was also a Steps member. They released their music under the name H & Claire. In January 2007 he came out as gay. In the same month, he was a housemate in Celebrity Big Brother. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Glamorgan Category:Celebrity Big Brother contestants Category:Gay men Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT dancers Category:LGBT singers Category:Musicians from Glamorgan Category:Welsh pop singers
title: Ian "H" Watkins
